title: avatAramAnAn rAghavan Adava
sahitya:
avatAramAnAn rAghavan Adava kulattirk-koru bOdhalar 
malarO enna kAdalAi tavattirangi mAdhavan rAghavanAgha


anupallavi

  bhuviyODu vAnum pOTrik-kUra puNNiya dasharathan Ashai niraivEra 
navami kaTatak punar pUsamum sEra jnAlamum viLanga vasanta kAlamum mudal ilanga


caraNam    shIrArum lakSaNa shatrughnanum vandu sumitrai vayiTru ninru pErAi 
pArAr pugazh kaikEsi vayiTrilE ninru bharatan vandu bhuvi sEra
kArAr kuzhal valli kausalai vayiTril kadirOr kOTi enru kUra 
karuNai oLi vIsa kaNDOrgaL kaN kUsa naralOkam vAnOrai araikUvi vilai pEsha
